input_email_body:
Subject: Concern Regarding Missing Project Data

A brief issue description: The project data has disappeared unexpectedly. It could be a result of a misalignment between the Redis and Cassandra integrations My name is Elena Ivanova.. I attempted to restart the servers and examined the Zapier logs, yet the problem still exists. I would be grateful if you could provide support to address this as quickly as possible. You can reach me at sophia.rossi@service.it.
